UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's basic profile within the Dish Directory application.

userId.description: The unique ID of the user from Firebase Authentication.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

message.description: The content of the notification message.

read.description: Indicates if the notification has been read.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the notification was created.

link.description: An optional link to navigate to when the notification is clicked.

UserRecipe.title: UserRecipe
UserRecipe.description: A recipe submitted by a user.

ContactMessage.title: ContactMessage
ContactMessage.description: A message submitted through the contact form.

email.description: The email address of the person sending the message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was submitted.

status.description: The status of the contact message.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Each document ID is the user's UID from Firebase Auth.

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: A subcollection storing notifications for a specific user.

/userRecipes/{recipeId}.description: A collection of recipes submitted by users.

/contactMessages/{messageId}.description: A collection of messages submitted through the contact form.
